verses.text: Tik sko tz'ib'ejb'at yab'ixal jun Lolonel sb'i t'ayex, aton jun tz'ak'an ko k 'inal. Aytax ek' t'a yichb’anel. Ix kab' sloloni. Ix quil wal ochi. Ix onh och k'elan t'ay, ix ko yamlan yet' ko k'ab'.

Ha jun tz'ak'an ko k 'inal chi', ix ch'oxchaj quila', ix quilanoch a onh tik, yuj chi' skak' testigoal ko b'a yuj, skalanpax eyab'i to a tz'ak'an ko k 'inal t'a junelnhej. Ha jun chi', aytaxon ek' yet' Dios, palta ix ch'oxji t'ayonh.
Yuj chi' a jun ix quil chi', jun ix kab' slolon chi', ha' skal t'ayex yic wach' junxonhej tzex aj a ex tik qued'oc. Yujto t'a wal yel wach'xo kak'an yet' ko Mam Dios yet' Jesucristo Yuninal.
Yuj chi' sko tz'ib'ejb'at juntzanh tik t'ayex, yic wach' ol te tz'acwoc ko tzalajk'olal.
Scalb'at eyab'i tas alb'ilkan yuj Jesucristo t'ayonh to ha Dios sakil k'inal yaji, malaj wal jab'oc k’ik’ k’inal t'ay.
Tato skala' to wach' kaj yet'oc, palta anheja' ay onh to ek' t'a k’ik’ k’inal, tonhej skal syal chi', a tas sko k'ulej manh yeloclaj.
Ha Dios sakil k'inal yaji. Yuj chi' tato a sakil k'inal sko b'eyb'alej, wach' kak'an yet'oc junjun onh, haxo schiq'uil Jesucristo Yuninal, ha' tz'ik'anel masanil ko chukal ayoch t'ayonh.
Tato skala' to malaj ko chukal, tonhej skak' musansatil ko b'a, manh yeloclaj tas skal chi'.
Tato t'a wal yel sko cha ko mulej ko chukal, ha Dios sukan sat smasanil, syik'anpaxel masanil tas manh wach'oc ayoch t'ayonh, yujto tojol toni, tz'elnhejk'och tas syala'.
Tato skala': Malaj b'aj ix och ko mul, ta xco chi, syalelk'ochi to wan kak'anoch Dios esalwumal. Tato icha chi', manh chab'iloclaj slolonel cuuj.
